ygData.subject: Re:  Bag of the Tinkerers
ygData.msgSnippet: Not much help in that one specifically, but somewhat related ... another way to get a great 100% weight reducing 10 slot bag, is to go to SolB, kill Guano
ygData.messageBody:
Not much help in that one specifically, but somewhat related ...
another way to get a great 100% weight reducing 10 slot bag, is to go
to SolB, kill Guano Harvester who is 15 lvl gob who hangs out near
the sonic Bats. That critter has the bag and we saw him about every
hour it seems; most everyone in our party got one. He remains visible
for a short time while he roams around the bats, but soon casts
inviso on himself. Will need to be in your mid-high 30's tho, to get
that far into the zone and hope to survive. But as a gnome that bag
is a blessing! I can now hold tons more stuff before I get
encumbered. But, it's a medium bag, which means it won't hold many
weapons, they being too big. The bag is called A Soiled Backpack, I
think and looks like an open backpack. And to anyone who knows about
this item, what would be the going price selling one?

Oops, realized its not really tinkering related...=)

Kilkin Cobblepot - 40 Gemchopper - Fen Ro



--- In EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com, "Russ Wilcox" <rwilcox@t...> wrote:
> I found this bag available from a merchant in Ak'Anon for 5868plat.
It has
> a capacity of 10 slots. Anybody know what this is about?
>
